item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Welcome to PyTorch-Igniteâ€™s quick start guide that covers the essentials of getting a project up and running while walking through basic concepts of Ignite. In just a few lines of code, you can get your model trained and validated. The complete code can be found at the end of this guide.
